metadata.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to AI

questions.question: What defines AI according to the Turing Test?
questions.explanation: The Turing Test defines AI as a machine's telligent behavior indistinguishable from that of a human.

questions.question: What defines AI according to the Turing Test?
questions.explanation: The Turing Test defines AI  to exhibit intelligent behavior indistinguishable from that of a human.

questions.explanation: The Turing Test defines AI as a machine's ability to exhibit intelligent of a human.
